name: Carla Cupcake
description:
Carla Cupcakes cupcake kingdom is under attack. Help her defend against Chuck Chockolate-Marshmellow Curt Cupcake and Dave Donut. Rumor has it, even Gina Giant-Cupcake herself is coming.

Controls

WASD to move

Left Mouse to shoot

Q E F to use abilities

Watch Out: using abilities costs you health
